content.question: The transformation of Le Creusot described by Samuelson in the second paragraph was most directly facilitated by which of the following?

choices.label: Lowering of tariffs and trade barriers between European states
Increasing availability of cheap labor supplied by immigrants to France

topic.text: 6.2: The Spread of Industry Throughout Europe

skill.text: Skill 1.B: Explain a historical concept, development, or process.
